message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MA, cs.SY, cs.DS 

This paper deals with reinforcement learning in Markov Decision Processes, which is a topic that falls under the umbrella of machine learning and artificial intelligence. The paper also discusses the exploration-exploitation trade-off, which is a common theme in the field of reinforcement learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). Other likely sub-categories include cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.MA (Multi-Agent Systems), cs.SY (Systems and Control), and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), as these sub-categories are also relevant to the topics discussed in the paper.
